metadata.title: CVE-2022-0685 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Use of Out-of-range Pointer Offset in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.4418.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

notes.note: ccdm94> for bionic and earlier, the vulnerable function is found in file src/misc1.c instead of src/filepath.c.

criterions.comment: vim package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3').
